title: Customized Design Strategies for Online Special Education and Therapeutic Support

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of special education and universal design principles
context.additional_context: Course for pre-/in-service teachers learning online education/therapy design for special education learners, conducted in microlearning formats implemented via mobile devices and BYOD environments

learning_goals: Propose at least three customized online learning material design strategies tailored to the needs of special education learners
Practice creating therapeutic activity content applying universal design principles
Apply accessibility enhancement strategies using QR codes and audio guidance features to real-world cases
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
